name: The Protector (timetravelhamster)
description:
Leveling your character,  protect the crops for a five minutes and you will beat the game. 

Controls are :

Right mouse button = Move

1 , 2 is active skills in the game

 you can spawn enemies with Left Mouse Button just for fun

The balance of the game is not very good, for someone is to easy for other to hard and I try to make it on the middle, but we all know this is not possible :D .I had no juice left in the tank to make win and lose condition better. Anyway I hope you like it and thank you for playtesting and good luck to all Devs.
